parameter.name: Application Path
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., Default Web Site/subtext)

parameter.name: Database Server
parameter.description: Location of your database server (i.e., localhost, .\SQLExpress, server name or IP address).

parameter.name: Database Name
parameter.description: Name of the database for your application.

parameter.name: Database Username
parameter.description: Username to access your application database.

parameter.name: Database Administrator
parameter.description: Administrator user name for your database.

parameter.name: Database Administrator Password
parameter.description: Password for the database administrator account.

parameter.name: Connection String
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server};Database={Database Name};uid={Database Administrator};Pwd={Database Administrator Password};

parameter.name: Connection String For Config
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the web.config.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server};Database={Database Name};uid={Database Username};Pwd={Database Password};

parameter.name: SetAclParameter1
parameter.description: Automatically sets write access for the application

parameter.name: SetAclParameter2
parameter.description: Automatically sets write access for the application
